summary: A freelance journalist named Beth Shelburne emails an unspecified facility (likely a prison or detention center) requesting current staffing levels for a story on prison suicides, mentioning the Jeffrey Epstein case as context. The document is marked as confidential and appears to be part of the SDNY's Epstein-related files.
